meta.title: About Us
meta.description: Edu.turkish is a team that helps students get admitted to universities in Turkey. 5+ years of experience, 500+ successful admissions.

hero.title: About us
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner in obtaining a quality education. We combine experience, expertise, and personalized guidance to make your admission to Turkey as simple and effective as possible.

who_we_are.title: Who we are
who_we_are.subtitle: We are an educational agency with years of experience specializing in admission to Turkish universities
who_we_are.experienced_agency_desc: We bring over 6 years of deep expertise in educational consulting. We have thoroughly mastered all the legal and academic nuances of the admission process, allowing us to successfully handle even the most non-standard challenges for our applicants.
who_we_are.students_enrolled_desc: We are proud to have helped over 500 students from various countries start a new chapter of their lives in Turkey's top universities, providing them with a reliable foundation for their international careers.
who_we_are.official_work_desc: Your peace of mind is our priority. All services are provided under an official contract that clearly outlines our obligations, admission guarantees, and the financial transparency of every transaction.
who_we_are.comprehensive_help_desc: We don't just help you get admitted; we accompany you every step of the way: from document apostille to finding comfortable housing and obtaining your residence permit (IKAMET) in Turkey.

team.title: Our team
team.subtitle: Professionals who know everything about admission to Turkish universities

hakim.name: Hakim Nagaev
hakim.description:
I am the founder of the agency that helps international students enroll in Turkish universities and adapt to life in a new country. I have been living in Istanbul since 2017 and I am well acquainted with the peculiarities of the local educational system and student life.

Currently, I am a senior student at İstanbul Sabahattin Zaim Üniversitesi majoring in Islamic Sciences. My personal experience as a student and many years of living in Turkey help me better understand the needs and difficulties of international students.

My goal is to make the process of admission and full settlement as easy and simple as possible: From choosing a university to processing all necessary documents and adapting in Turkey. I strive to provide only up-to-date information and accompany students at every stage of their journey.

nazrin.name: Nazrin Imanova
nazrin.description: I am Nazrin Imanova, a consultant and student curator at the agency. Since 2022, I have been living in Istanbul and studying for a Master's degree at İstanbul Aydın University in Business Administration. As I myself have gone through the path of an international student, I understand perfectly well what difficulties guys face when moving, and I know how to make this process easier and more comfortable. In my work, I focus on responsibility, attention to detail, and high-quality support so that every student feels support and confidence in a new country. In addition to consulting activities, I am actively interested in issues of intercultural adaptation and international education, which helps me even better understand the needs of students and find the right solutions for them.

adam.name: Adam Zugiraev
adam.description:
I am Adam, the developer responsible for ensuring that our online platform works quickly, clearly, and without failures. All forms, buttons, personal accounts, tests — all this should work conveniently and clearly, and I make sure that it is so.

My task is to make sure that the student can easily submit an application, get the necessary information, and not waste nerves on technical difficulties. While the team helps with the choice of university and adaptation, I help by ensuring that everything "inside" the site works as it should.

I believe that a good system is one that you don't even think about because it just works. That's what I strive for every day.

nargiz.name: Nargiz
nargiz.description:
My name is Nargiz, I am a Digital Content Manager. I am 23 years old and have been living in Istanbul for four years. I study at İstanbul Aydın Üniversitesi in the Graphic Design faculty — I chose this major because I am close to art, I love to create, visualize ideas, and express myself through design.

My path to studying in Turkey was not easy: I went through all the stages of admission and preparation, faced difficulties and even fraudsters, which is why I had to do everything again — collect documents, look for a new company, and organize the move myself. Once there, I solved all the issues myself: from obtaining a residence permit to finding housing. This experience taught me a lot — independence, responsibility, and self-belief.

Now I share my knowledge and experience of living and studying in Turkey on our social networks. I tell honestly and openly about all the difficulties and pros to help others avoid mistakes and inspire them not to be afraid to pursue their goals.
